title: Crystallinity as a factor of SERS stability of silver nanoparticles formed by Ar<sup>+</sup> irradiation
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Natalia V. Doroshina, Oleg A. Streletskiy, Ilya A. Zavidovskiy, Mikhail K. Tatmyshevskiy, Gleb I. Tselikov, Olesya O. Kapitanova, Alexander V. Syuy, Roman Romanov, Prabhash Mishra, Vjaceslavs Bobrovs, Andrey M. Markeev, Dmitry I. Yakubovsky, Irina A. Veselova, Aleksey V. Arsenin, Valentyn S. Volkov, Sergey M. Novikov
